pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Moisturizing Body Wash 400ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Moisturising Body Wash with Shea Butter contains pure Cocoa Butter and Shea Butter, to provide ultimate moisture for your skin, leaving it soft and smooth.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. In case of eye contact, rinse immediately with water.

Common Uses

Paraben, Sulfate and Phthalate Free. Contains plant derived ingredients.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Glycol Stearate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Cocamide MEA, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Acrylates Crosspolymer-4, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance (Parfum), Tetrasodium EDTA, PEG-150 Distearate, Sorbic Acid, Benzoic Acid, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Orange 4 (CI 15510).

Directions

For best results, apply a small amount onto a cleansing pouf or washcloth, gently massage onto the body in the shower, and then rinse. To help keep skin moisturised throughout the day, follow with your favourite Palmer's body lotion.
